data.title: Car Rental in Drammen
data.meta_description: Drammen Car Rental â¤ SIXT makes the drive as enjoyable as the destination â Choose from Luxury Cars, SUVs, Convertibles, Minivans & more!
data.text:
If you are looking for an exciting way to explore the city of Drammen and its scenic surroundings, look no further as Sixt is here to help. A great entourage of vehicles including Peugeots, Toyotas and Hondas are available for car rental and several packages are in place for you. When you rent a car in Drammen, you can rely on exceptional service and you can weave additional drivers into your Drammen car rental policy too. This is made even more secure with the option to cover yourself with LDW. The Sixt office is located at Drammen train station, which is close by to a number of local attractions. The Drammen office is open from Monday to Friday and once you have collected your vehicle, you will be able to enjoy a road trip in one of the most scenic parts of Norway.

By taking advantage of the Drammen rent a car service offered by Sixt, you can drive away and enjoy a trouble free holiday in Norway. Anyone with a love for wildlife will be in their element here as the city is surrounded by hills and rivers, so you may want to take advantage of unlimited mileage. Sixt would like to suggest a few attractions in Drammen worth visiting such as Spiralen, Kjosterudjuvet and Drammen Water Park, the biggest in the country. Sixt looks forward to meeting you.
